title: Feast
cleaned_text: - he made them a feast, [Gen. 19:3](/study/scriptures/ot/gen/19.3?lang=eng#p3). - hold a feast unto me in the wilderness, [Ex. 5:1](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/5.1?lang=eng#p1) ( [10:9](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/10.9?lang=eng#p9)). - keep it a feast to the Lord, [Ex. 12:14](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/12.14?lang=eng#p14). - observe the feast of unleavened bread, ( [23:15](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/23.15?lang=eng#p15); [34:18](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/34.18?lang=eng#p18)). - Three a feast unto me, [Ex. 23:14](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/23.14?lang=eng#p14). - feast of harvest, ... and the feast of ingathering, [Ex. 23:16](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/23.16?lang=eng#p16). - proclamation ... To morrow is a feast to the Lord, [Ex. 32:5](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/32.5?lang=eng#p5). - observe the feast of weeks, [Ex. 34:22](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/34.22?lang=eng#p22). - seventh month shall be the feast of tabernacles, [Lev. 23:34](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/23.34?lang=eng#p34). - do unto the Lord in your set feasts, [Num. 29:39](/study/scriptures/ot/num/29.39?lang=eng#p39). - all thy males appear before the Lord ... in the feast of unleavened bread, and in the feast of weeks, and in the feast of tabernacles, [Deut. 16:16](/study/scriptures/ot/deut/16.16?lang=eng#p16). - Samson made there a feast, [Judg. 14:10](/study/scriptures/ot/judg/14.10?lang=eng#p10). - Solomon held a feast, [1 Kgs. 8:65](/study/scriptures/ot/1-kgs/8.65?lang=eng#p65) ( [2 Chr. 7:8](/study/scriptures/ot/2-chr/7.8?lang=eng#p8)). - all the set feasts of the Lord, [Ezra 3:5](/study/scriptures/ot/ezra/3.5?lang=eng#p5). - merry heart hath a continual feast, [Prov. 15:15](/study/scriptures/ot/prov/15.15?lang=eng#p15). - your appointed feasts my soul hateth, [Isa. 1:14](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/1.14?lang=eng#p14). - Belshazzar the king made a great feast, [Dan. 5:1](/study/scriptures/ot/dan/5.1?lang=eng#p1). - I despise your feast days, [Amos 5:21](/study/scriptures/ot/amos/5.21?lang=eng#p21). - keep thy solemn feasts,
